function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in declaring workers as essential","Impact":"Reduced access to services for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Officially designate essential workers in a timely manner","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Workers in non-essential services","Owner":"Government"},{"Description":"Nationwide stay-at-home orders and curfews","Impact":"Suppression of constitutional rights and mobility","Mitigation":"Balancing public health measures with human rights considerations","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General population","Owner":"Government"},{"Description":"Closure of schools and continued stay-at-home orders","Impact":"Disruption of education and increased child and adolescent vulnerability","Mitigation":"Develop alternative education strategies and support systems","Technologies":"Online education platforms","People":"Students, parents, educators","Owner":"Education authorities"}]}
